title: little question
body:
Hello there,

I live in California for summer i am originally from saudi arabia so i usually play in EUW server when i am in saudi but when i came here the first time i started playing in NA server my ms is 70 or 60 sometimes in here but back in saudi when i play in EUW it's 120 constant. it's never been lower than that, and i thought in my self it's maybe because of my geographical distance from the server it self, but RIOT opened servers for a lot of regions except in the middle east countries like saudi arabia, united arab emirates, kuwait, bahrain and so on of other countries, so i was wondering why there is server in the middle east for theses countries becasue we suffer with high latency. i just want to know what stopping you from doing that? 
any ideas please share.
thanks in advance.

replies.body: There could be a variety of issues that can cause an increased ping, but it's commonly due to a network problem trying to communicate with our servers.  The distance to our servers, your ISP's routing, or something else could be a few factors.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would be handy to test the strength of your connection when you play different connections.  You can also obtain a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)to get an overview of your routing to discover how far exactly your connection is traveling to get to us.  I hope these resources help!
